panels.settings.buttons.filters.name: Name
Another message change is already in progress
Send the new message to use for the new addons
Send the new message to use for the updated addons

NOTE: You must reply to this message otherwise you will get ignored.
Avaible Platforms: modrinth and curseforge. Avaible Variables:
{{PLATFORM/name}}: Name of the mod. {{PLATFORM/authors}}: Name of the creators of the mod. {{PLATFORM/authorsUrl}}: Link to the profiles of the creators of the mod. {{PLATFORM/version}}: Latest version in the versions list. {{PLATFORM/versions}}: List of the versions supported by mod. {{PLATFORM/modloaders}}: Lista of the modloaders supported by mod. {{PLATFORM/categories}}: List of the categories of the mod. {{PLATFORM/description}}: Description of the mod. {{PLATFORM/created}}: Creation date of the mod. {{PLATFORM/modified}}: Modification date of the mod. {{PLATFORM/color}}: Color of the mod. {{PLATFORM/follows}}: Amount of people who follow the mod. {{PLATFORM/downloads}}: Amount of downloads of the mod. {{PLATFORM/icon}}: Icon of the mod. {{PLATFORM/license}}: The licence of the mod. {{PLATFORM/clientSide}}: Whether the mod is required on the client. {{PLATFORM/serverSide}}: Whether the mod is required on the server. {{PLATFORM/slug}}: The ID of the mod. {{platforms}}: List of the platforms where the mod is avaible. example: Name on Modrinth: {{modrinth/name}}, Name on Curseforge: {{curseforge/name}}
Conditional Variables:
{{?variable:true|false?}} example: {{?curseforge:The name on curseforge is {{curseforge/name}}|The mod is not avaible on curseforge?}} Sends "The name on curseforge is (name)" if the variable "curseforge/name" exists, otherwise sends "The mod is not avaible on curseforge". {{?curseforge/authors:The creators on curseforge are {{authors}}|?}} Sends "The creators on curseforge are (names)" if the variable "name" exists, otherwise doesn't send anything.

NOTE: You must reply to this message otherwise you will get ignored.
Avaible Platforms: modrinth and curseforge. Avaible versions: old (before the update) and new (after the update). Avaible Variables (none of those variables is always present):
{{names/PLATFORM}}: The name of the addon on the platform. {{PLATFORM/name/VERSION}}: New/old name of the mod (if the name did not change, this variable will not be avaible and you will have to use {{names/PLATFORM}}). {{PLATFORM/authors/VERSION}}*: New/old name dei creators of the mod. {{PLATFORM/authorsUrl/VERSION}}*: New/old link to the profiles of the creators of the mod. {{PLATFORM/version/VERSION}}: New/old latest version in the versions list. {{PLATFORM/versions/VERSION}}*: New/old list of the versions supported by the mod. {{PLATFORM/modloaders/VERSION}}*: New/old lista dei modloader supportati dalla mod. {{PLATFORM/categories/VERSION}}*: New/old list of the cateogires of the mod. {{PLATFORM/description/VERSION}}: New/old description of the mod. {{PLATFORM/created/VERSION}}: New/old creation date of the mod. {{PLATFORM/modified/VERSION}}: New/old modification date of the mod. {{PLATFORM/color/VERSION}}: New/old color of the mod. {{PLATFORM/follows/VERSION}}: New/old amount of people who follow mod. {{PLATFORM/downloads/VERSION}}: New/old amount of downloads of the mod. {{PLATFORM/icon/VERSION}}: New/old icon of the mod. {{PLATFORM/license/VERSION}}: New/old licence of the mod. {{PLATFORM/clientSide/VERSION}}: Whether the mod was/is required on the client. {{PLATFORM/serverSide/VERSION}}: Whether the mod was/is required on the server. {{PLATFORM/slug/VERSION}}: New/old ID of the mod. {{platforms*}}: >New/old List of the platforms where the mod is avaible. *: The versions of those mods also inclues added (added compared to the previous version) e removed (removed compared to the previous version).
Conditional Variables:
{{?variable:true|false?}} example: {{?curseforge/name/old:The old name on curseforge is {{curseforge/name/old}}, the new curseforge name is {{curseforge/name/new}}|The name didn't change?}} Sends "the new curseforge name is (name vecchio)" if the variable "curseforge/name/old" exists, otherwise sends "The name didn't change". {{?modrinth/authors/new:The modrinth authors are {{modrinth/authors/new}}|?}} Sends "The modrinth authors are (names)" if the variable "modrinth/authors" esiste, otherwise doesn't send anything.
You updated the message for the new addons
You updated the message for the updated addons
commands.setchannel.messages.success: This chat has been configured for the addons notifications
commands.settings.messages.notConfigured: This chat has not been configured for the addons notifications
commands.settings.messages.success: Settings for the Create addons notifications
commands.start.messages.success:
Welcome! This bot will allow you to receive notification when an addon for the Minecraft mod "Create" gets updated or created.
My commands are:

- /setchannel - Sets the channel where to send addon notifications.
- /settings - Manage the settings of the bot.

Made by @Stef_DP and published on GitHub.
commands.preview.messages.notConfigured: This chat has been configured for the addons notifications
commands.preview.messages.invalidArgs: You must specify a message between "new" (new addon) or "update" (updated addon)
